#Draiocht - I know it used to be 'organised' but one could hardly count on the few labelled ids and ctrl-f is needed to find anything anyway, so I just
#merged everything together to more easily search, copy, and paste. Plus it was getting to a point where there were enough changes that is was 
#pointless to compare with vanilla anyway. Hope this doesn't mess with anyone's submod.

#Using this primarily for wet tropics with 'exotic' diseases
tropical = {
	1164 1165 1166 1169 1170 1171 1172 1901 2948 2949 798 1168 1114  1117 1118 1119 1120 1121 1122 1124 1125 1126 1136 1137 1138

#Using this only for true deserts, generally with under 200mm or so annual precipitation, and with sand dunes or sun-baked rock

#Generally using this for areas around or above the tree line, with at least sporadic permafrost and average winter temperatures of at least -20C

#Generally places where snow is not unusual, but not guaranteed in a year and average winter temps is below 10, but above 0

#Generally places with accumulating snowpack, severe winter storms, and average winter temperatures well under 0C

impassable = {
	#1700s and 1800s Vanilla wastelands
	1779 1781 1782 1783 1784 1785 1786 1787 1788 1789 1790 1791 1793 1794 1795 1796 1797 1798 1799 1801 1802 1803 1804 1807 1814 
	#Other Vanilla wastelands
	1173 1950 2194 2200 2251 2334 2426 2740 2936 
	#Vanilla RNW provinces apparently set aside for wastelands -This will need some work if ever overhauling TOT projection for RNW
	3590 3591 3592 3593 3594 3595 3596 3597 3598 3599 3620 3621 3622 3623 3624 3625 3626 3427 3628 3629 3630 3631 3632 3633 3634 3635 3636 3437 3638 3639
	#1.19 wastelands (plus 5118, 5119, and 5121)
	4146 4154 4156 4157 4159 4160 4161 4162 4167 4179 5118 5119 5121 5124 5125 5126 
	#1.19 cut wastelands
	#4153			Scandes, 2000m... wow... Not even glacier covered at the 67th parallel... This is barely a hill, and no worse than most of Lappland
	#4155			Carpathians, controversial, but I've seen nothing to convince me these are any other than hills. Sorry to the dozens of people this will anger....
	#4168			Eastern High Atlas, I'm still not convinced anything in the Atlas Mountains deserve a wasteland, they seem more habitable/nicer than the desert
	#4169			Aures, seriously... a warm 2400m as wasteland? While we're at it, lets make everything outside of N France and N Italy wasteland
	#4170			Zagros, Tough call, exceeds 4000m, but also appear to have been crossed and settled due to latitude and weather. Might rethink this when overhaul makes it here
	#4172			Zagros2, Tough call, exceeds 4000m, but also appear to have been crossed and settled due to latitude and weather. Might rethink this when overhaul makes it here
	#4177			Elburz, Very tough call. 5000m plus, but latitude, weather, & passes prompt me to say no wasteland. Might rethink this when overhaul makes it here
	#4178			Pontic Mountains, Another tough call but low latitude, mild weather and under 4000m, mostly forested, no glacier coverage, regularly crossed by traders and armies.... cutting it
	
	1913	#Northern Rockies, still a wasteland for now - maybe always
	
	4140 4151			#Ran into some weird and very rare bugs with units getting stuck off the map by somehow getting to these (cut vanilla) provinces. Hopefully making them wastelands will fix this -note probably event spawned troops, if I had to guess... oh well, this is a cheap fix but should be effective
	
	#BTP provinces replaced by new 1.16, 1.19, and 1.22 Paradox province ids, added to wastelands as a redundancy, but probably not needed
	3011 3013 3017 3032 3079 3082 3125 3126 3129 3131 3147 3149 3153 3155 3236 3269 3274 3283 3286 3228 3234 3240
	#BT and BTP provinces replaced by new 1.23 Paradox province ids, added to wastelands as a redundancy, but probably not needed
	5132 5160 5133 5149 5166 5153 5136 5169 5183 5179 5182 5202 5262 5263 5265 5268 5269 5275 5270 5276 5148 
	5292 5294 3255 5291 3249 3252 3259 3258 3257 3260 5230 5234 5237 5253 5260 5254 5252 5257 5248 5247 5245 5236 
	5258 5242 5238 5259 5240 5506 5159 5204 
	#BtP and BT provinces removed in 1.25 due to being replaced with new Paradox provinces. Added to wastelands as a redundancy.
	3004 3007 3010 3012 3016 3018 3020 3021 3022 3023 3024 3025 3026 3027 3029 3030 3031 3033 3035 3057 3059 3062 3067 3072 3074 
	3076 3078 3080 3086 3091 3093 3023 5099
	
	#Beyond Typus New Wastelands
	5120 5111 5112 5123 5116 5117 5507 5508 5509 5510 5511 5512 5513 5514 5515 5516 5517 5518 5519 5520 5521 5522 5523 5524 5525 5526 5527 5528 5113 
	#Beyond Typus Reserved For Planned Wastelands
	#5114 5115
	#Beyond Typus New Wastelands Later Removed
	#5113 2608 5122 5127 5128 
}
